languages.text: {n}Миряне обступают со всех сторон, теснят и давят. Их лица источают жар ужаса и гнева. Масса тел вскипает энергией насилия. Эту энергию тяжело обуздывать. Напуганные люди — опасные люди. План охоты был иным. Но Неумирающий вершит свою волю как желает.{/n}

{n}The laypeople press in from all sides, pushing and shoving. Their faces are ablaze with terror and rage, and a violent energy boils through the mass of bodies. This power will be difficult to contain — frightened people are dangerous people. The hunt was meant to go differently, but such is the Undying One's will.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Миряне обступают со всех сторон, теснят и давят. Их лица источают жар ужаса и гнева. Масса тел вскипает энергией насилия. Эту энергию тяжело обуздывать. Напуганные люди — опасные люди. План охоты был иным. Но Неумирающий вершит свою волю как желает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The laypeople are pressing in on all sides, pushing and squeezing. Their faces exude the heat of terror and anger. The mass of damp bodies boils with the energy of violence. This power is hard to control, frightened people are dangerous people. The hunt was meant to be different, but the Undying One moves in mysterious ways.{/n}

{n}The laypeople are pressing in on all sides, pushing and squeezing. Their faces exude the heat of terror and anger. The mass of damp bodies boils with the energy of violence. This power is hard to control, frightened people are dangerous people. The hunt was meant to be different, but the Undying One moves in mysterious ways.{/n}

This power will be hard to contain — frightened people are dangerous people. The hunt was meant to be different, but the Undying One moves in mysterious ways.{/n}

{n}The laypeople press in from all sides, pushing and shoving. Their faces are ablaze with terror and rage, and a violent energy boils through the mass of bodies. This power will be difficult to contain — frightened people are dangerous people. The hunt was meant to go differently, but such is the Undying One's will.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Laien drängen von allen Seiten heran, sie drücken und schieben. In ihren Gesichtern flammen Angst und Zorn, und eine gewalttätige Energie kocht durch die Menge an Körpern. Diese Kraft wird schwer einzudämmen sein – verängstigte Menschen sind gefährlich. Die Jagd hätte anders ablaufen sollen, aber so will es der Todlose.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The laypeople press in from all sides, pushing and shoving. Their faces are ablaze with terror and rage, and a violent energy boils through the mass of bodies. This power will be difficult to contain — frightened people are dangerous people. The hunt was meant to go differently, but such is the Undying One's will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Laien drängen von allen Seiten heran, sie drücken und schieben. In ihren Gesichtern flammen Angst und Zorn, und eine gewalttätige Energie kocht durch die Menge an Körpern. Diese Kraft wird schwer einzudämmen sein – verängstigte Menschen sind gefährlich. Die Jagd hätte anders ablaufen sollen, aber so will es der Todlose.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los laicos presionan desde cada ángulo, empujando con fuerza. Sus caras están enrojecidas de terror y furia, y una energía violenta recorre la masa de cuerpos. Será difícil contener este poder: la gente asustada es peligrosa. La caza debía tener otro resultado, pero tal es la voluntad del Inmortal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The laypeople press in from all sides, pushing and shoving. Their faces are ablaze with terror and rage, and a violent energy boils through the mass of bodies. This power will be difficult to contain — frightened people are dangerous people. The hunt was meant to go differently, but such is the Undying One's will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los laicos presionan desde cada ángulo, empujando con fuerza. Sus caras están enrojecidas de terror y furia, y una energía violenta recorre la masa de cuerpos. Será difícil contener este poder: la gente asustada es peligrosa. La caza debía tener otro resultado, pero tal es la voluntad del Inmortal.{/n}

languages.text: {n}俗人が四方から押し寄せて、もみくちゃになる。その顔は恐怖と怒りに燃え、荒々しいエネルギーが体という塊の中で沸き立っていた。この力を封じ込めるのは難しい…怯えている人間は危険なのだ。狩りはこのような形になるはずではなかったが、これも不死の者の意志なのだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The laypeople press in from all sides, pushing and shoving. Their faces are ablaze with terror and rage, and a violent energy boils through the mass of bodies. This power will be difficult to contain — frightened people are dangerous people. The hunt was meant to go differently, but such is the Undying One's will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}俗人が四方から押し寄せて、もみくちゃになる。その顔は恐怖と怒りに燃え、荒々しいエネルギーが体という塊の中で沸き立っていた。この力を封じ込めるのは難しい…怯えている人間は危険なのだ。狩りはこのような形になるはずではなかったが、これも不死の者の意志なのだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}乌合之众从各个方向不断推搡着。他们的脸上写满了恐惧与愤怒，暴虐的能量在无数人的身体中沸腾。这种力量很难控制，因为心怀恐惧的人往往非常危险。这场狩猎本不该是这个样子，但当下的局面正是不死之神的旨意。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The laypeople press in from all sides, pushing and shoving. Their faces are ablaze with terror and rage, and a violent energy boils through the mass of bodies. This power will be difficult to contain — frightened people are dangerous people. The hunt was meant to go differently, but such is the Undying One's will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}乌合之众从各个方向不断推搡着。他们的脸上写满了恐惧与愤怒，暴虐的能量在无数人的身体中沸腾。这种力量很难控制，因为心怀恐惧的人往往非常危险。这场狩猎本不该是这个样子，但当下的局面正是不死之神的旨意。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les profanes se pressent de tous côtés en se poussant et se bousculant. Leurs visages sont déformés par un mélange de terreur et de colère, tandis qu'une énergie violente bout dans la masse des corps. Cette puissance sera difficile à contenir... la peur rend les gens dangereux. La chasse devait se dérouler autrement, mais telle est la volonté de l'Immortel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The laypeople press in from all sides, pushing and shoving. Their faces are ablaze with terror and rage, and a violent energy boils through the mass of bodies. This power will be difficult to contain — frightened people are dangerous people. The hunt was meant to go differently, but such is the Undying One's will.{/n}
